name: Human
description: The standard human baseline. Humans are adaptable and diverse, found throughout known space.

name: Aslan
description: Proud feline sophonts known for their honor-based culture and territorial nature.
specialRules: Territory: Strong drive to acquire and defend territory

name: Vargr
description: Canine-descended sophonts known for their charismatic leadership and pack mentality.
specialRules: Pack Mentality: +1 DM to Leadership checks with other Vargr

name: Zhodani
description: Psychic humans with a rigid caste-based society and powerful psionic abilities.
specialRules: Psionic: All Zhodani have psionic potential
Telepathic Training: +2 DM to Telepathy skill checks

name: Vilani
description: Ancient human minor race known for their conservative culture and administrative skills.
specialRules: Administrative Training: +1 DM to Admin and Bureaucracy checks

name: Solomani
description: Terran-descended humans with a strong sense of genetic purity and nationalism.
specialRules: Genetic Purity: +1 DM to resist genetic modifications and diseases
